snippet.title: Selfloss | Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Selfloss is coming to PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch on September 12, 2024.

Learn more about the story of Selfloss in the brand new trailer, diving deep into the world which you must help Kazimir traverse. Sieze this second chance at life and help those around you who suffer from the evil Miasma infection that infects the land. Find peace and perform the Selfloss ritual.

You can try the first level of Selfloss for yourself with the free demo on Steam and PS5, and prepare to enter a Slavic-inspired dark fantasy by adding Selfloss to your wishlist today!

Steam Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1086620/Selfloss/
PS5 Demo: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP1121-PPSA22007_00-0853157731086680

Follow Selfloss on social media and wishlist now: https://linktr.ee/selfloss
